name: Lode Jogger
description:
Arrow keys plus comma/dot to dig!

Plenty left to do, but wanted to get what I had pushed in before the deadline.

Sound, music, animations, effects - hooboy, there was a lot I didn't do. It barely works! But some of it does, which is neat! This is way more like a GB proof of concept than anything else, trying to put together a Lode Runner-esque thing in a week.

(Oh, yeah, for the purposes of the jam? Totally didn't make all the assets during. Oops.)
